New Records: Edwin Uceta threw the fastest pitch of his season, 96.2 mph, which drilled Nick Castellanos in the hip.
Key Match Events: The benches cleared after Edwin Uceta threw at Nick Castellanos, with Bryce Harper being restrained by Tampa Bay players.
Trea Turner homered twice, a notable development considering he had two home runs in his previous 20 games.
Post-Match Reflections: Bryce Harper expressed his upset over the incident, saying it's 'not something we should accept as Major League Baseball.'
Harper also stated that he was close to doing more than yelling at Uceta, but didn't want to be a 'loser' and come up behind him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies are rolling and can taste it after rallying past the Rays, with their magic number for the division title being 10.
The team is banged up, but winning and getting it done, with Ranger Su√°rez allowing 12 hits in 5 1/3 innings.
Others: Bryce Harper has not homered in 28 games, the second-longest drought of his career, but is hitting.373/.440/.533 in his last 20 games.
